document_data.image: Red Bess and the Kelpie's Regret.png
document_data.name: ''Red Bess and the Kelpie's Regret''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Red Bess and the Kelpie's Regret''''' was a [[chapbook]] owned by the [[tiefling]] [[bounty hunter]] [[Havilar]]. It was about a [[kelpie]].
document_data.Description: Havilar gave her copy to her twin sister [[Farideh]], claiming the story reminded her of Farideh's relationship with [[Lorcan]].
